import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; import AboutImg from "../../assets/about.jpg"; import CV from "../../assets/HarshVijay.pdf"; import Info from "./Info"; const About = () => { return (

About Me

My introduction

Hello there I'm Harsh Vijay, and I'm now pursuing a Master of Computer Applications (MCA) degree. I am an enthusiastic and dedicated learner with a strong interest in becoming a software developer and web developer. I have developed a strong foundation in web development technologies, database management systems, and programming languages including Java, C/C++, and JavaScript throughout my academic career. I am always seeking for ways to increase my knowledge and stay current with the most recent trends and advancements in the pitch. I'm excited to get some real-world experience in the software and web development fields as a newbie. My strong analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities will allow me to approach complicated challenges uniquely and effectively.

); }; export default About;
